Name: User Sign In and Home Page Verification
Description: Navigate to the home page, sign in, and verify successful login by checking the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link SignIn -> Navigate to page 'auth/login'
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page ''
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Language Selection and Product Interaction Flow
Description: Navigate to home, switch languages, interact with product items, add to favorites, and verify language changes.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button LanguageDE
Step 3: Click on link languageSelection (LanguageES)
Step 4: Click on button LanguageES
Step 5: Click on link languageSelection (LanguageTR)
Step 6: Click on link productItems (ProductThorHammer) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 7: Click on button favoritesCartActions (AddToCart)
Step 8: Click on link MoreInfo
Step 9: Click on button favoritesCartActions (AddToFavorites)
Step 10: Click on button favoritesCartActions (AddToFavorites)
Step 11: Click on link Cart -> Navigate to page '/checkout'
Step 12: Click on link ThorHammerQuantity
Step 13: Click on fa ThorHammerQuantity
Step 14: Click on td QuantityCell
Step 15: Click on button LanguageTR -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 16: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Admin Login and Favorites Management Flow
Description: Navigate to home, change language, log in as admin, manage product quantities, and delete favorites while verifying the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on button LanguageTR
Step 3: Click on link languageSelection (LanguageEN)
Step 4: Click on link SignIn2 -> Navigate to page 'auth/login'
Step 5: Login -> Navigate to page 'admin/dashboard'
Step 6: Click on link Home -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 7: Click on link productItems (ProductCombinationPliers) -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 8: Click on fa IncreaseQuantity
Step 9: Click on button favoritesCartActions (AddToFavorites2)
Step 10: Click on link Categories
Step 11: Click on button LanguageEN
Step 12: Click on div HomeCategories
Step 13: Click on link SignIn -> Navigate to page 'auth/login'
Step 14: Login -> Navigate to page '/account'
Step 15: Click on link Favorites -> Navigate to page 'account/favorites'
Step 16: Click on button DeleteFavorite
Step 17: Click on link Home -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 18: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
